ai-tha-ap200:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap200:1.3_0: In the last watch of the night,
ai-tha-ap200:2.2_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap200:2.4_0: to whom you worship the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap200:3.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap200:3.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap200:4.1_0: if it is for twenty years.
ai-tha-ap200:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mucalinda.
